'''''"I Hate 'Em Myself!"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to be attacked by a [[Wenut]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*
-->
==Trivia==
* The achievement is a reference to a scene from the 1988 fantasy horror comedy film {{w|Beetlejuice}}, where the titular character Betelgeuse says "[https://youtu.be/E6WF6mCgGYE Sandworms... I Hate 'Em Myself!]"
